CdrDoc.CdrDocXml:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:transform xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:cdr="cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr"> <xsl:output method="text"/> <!-- =========================================================== This filter creates a list of country names ===========================================================-->
<xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:apply-templates select="PoliticalSubUnit/PoliticalSubUnitFullName"/> </xsl:template>
</xsl:transform>
